content: Create .env.local from template and configure API keys/connections
Implement missing Next.js API routes (/api/portfolio/summary, /api/market/overview, etc.)
Configure PostgreSQL/Redis connections and run migrations
Implement missing service worker to fix PWA errors
Replace mock data with real market data integration
Complete WebSocket implementation for real-time updates
Build missing Docker microservices (MCP, Vault, Trading API, Viz)
Implement user authentication and security system
